issue.title: [Python] `add_column` method missing in pyarrow.RecordBatch
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15434](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15434). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`add_column` method missing in `pyarrow.RecordBatch` object (It's available for `Table` though). I think it's a simple, yet important functionality :)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15434?focusedCommentId=17481251) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
While it's certainly fine to already add this specific method short-term, this could probably also be covered by ARROW-15042
